nodes.text: Drift Hills Imperial Outpost was a military outpost of the Sith Empire established on the border of the Clabburn Tundra and the Icefall Plains on the planet Hoth. The bulk of the outpost was located underground in the northern edge of the Frigid Plain in the Icefall Plains, and the other entrance opened onto the Southern Snowdrift Hills on the Clabburn Tundra.
